name: Rybak Ciasny
description:
What if Motherload... but underwater?

Welcome to the world of Rybak Ciasny, where you have the misfortune of being a diver in a dangerous ocean.

You're alone and must dive to mine minerals, in hopes of selling them once you can get back to the surface.

However, you must not only watch out for the deadly sea creatures, but also your own oxygen tank.

Descend into randomly generated caves, mine, sell, and upgrade your tools, and maybye... you'll be brave enough to descend to the depths...

CREDITS Programming

RickiManda - terrain generation & UI

kubao503 - inventory & game management systems

LubieKakao1212 - enemy AI

pizgacz - player controller

Dungal - additional programming

Graphics

Mildanach - all used & unused graphics

Project management

Jano - mentor

QA

PJS - manual testing

Who are we?

We're members of KNTG Polygon, and this game was made during our mentoring program, where we try to learn how to make a game in one semester!

Assets used

https://ansimuz.itch.io/underwater-fantasy-pixel-art-environment - in-game and store page
